TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时处于虚拟模式，以及将更改的一系列项的选择状态。The event occurs when the is in virtual mode, and the selection state of a range of items is changed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#482](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#482)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#482](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#482)]

MemberSignature.Value: public ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs (int startIndex, int endIndex, bool isSelected);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 startIndex, int32 endIndex, bool isSelected) cil managed
Public Sub New (startIndex As Integer, endIndex As Integer, isSelected As Boolean)
public: ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs(int startIndex, int endIndex, bool isSelected);

param.name: startIndex
param.span: 范围中更改了选择状态的第一项的索引。

span.span: The index of the first item in the range that has changed.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: 范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引。

span.span: The index of the last item in the range that has changed.

param.name: isSelected
param.span: 如果为 ，则指示已选定范围中的项；如果为 ，则指示已取消选择范围中的项。

span.span: to indicate the items are selected; to indicate the items are deselected.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 选择要取消选择，并取消选择为选定项从更改时发生。The occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected. `isSelected`参数指示的项的范围的当前状态。The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EndIndex As Integer
public: property int EndIndex { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引

span.span: Gets the index for the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed

value.span: 范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引。

span.span: The index of the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ListView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ListView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
